full_summary:
# Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada Architecture Services for Custom Applications
 candidates are invited to respond to a Request for Proposal (RFP) to provide Architecture Services for custom applications to Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC).
# Brief Description
The Information Systems Branch (ISB) of AAFC has ongoing requirements for experienced IT professionals to provide expertise in architecture services for its custom applications. The services will provide additional capacity to the existing personnel of ISB and support its clients and employees.
## Scope of Work
Provide Architecture Services for AAFC's custom applications, which will include:
* Conducting feasibility studies and impact analyses
* Developing and implementing architecture plans and roadmaps
* Providing advice on technical standards and best practices
## Additional Information
* Only one contract will be awarded
* A Task Authorization Contract will be established with the successful bidder
* Services will be required on an "as and when requested" basis
* The contract is expected to start on 01 February 2025 and end on 31 March 2026
## Contact Information
* Val Judenne, Business Intelligence Analyst
* val.judenne@agr.gc.ca
* 555555
## Documents
* RFP Document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51555/01b68-24-0749-npp-tbips-english.pdf>
* French RFP Document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51555/01b68-24-0749_apm-spict-francais.pdf>
# Guidelines for Registration
Candidates must meet the following eligibility criteria:
* Be a TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holder
* Have experience in providing architecture services for custom applications
* Have a proven track record of delivering high-quality services
Please submit your proposal by 27 November 2024 at 14:00 EST to be considered for this RFP. Response to this RFP cannot be made in person, it must be submitted electronically.

The translation between English and French was maintained, only removing the duplication of clauses and modifying the translation for better reading and comprehension.
